Title: Adaptive Cooling Salve
Description:
Should you need my assistance, I can craft you an ointment that should prove helpful in your attunement with Fyr'alath.

Bring me the materials I don't have, and I'm sure I can put something together.
ObjectivesText: Bring Erden Zaralek Glowspores, Awakened Frost, and a Dreaming Essence for the Adaptive Cooling Salve.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Erden in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
